text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea blumutensis (called, along with some other species in the genus Shorea, Yellow Meranti) is a species of plant in the Dipterocarpaceae family. It is found in Indonesia and Malaysia.
text.Sources: Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea blumutensis". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T33407A9780896. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T33407A9780896.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
